lead_paragraph: Jean-Claude Biver is head of the watch division of LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton and interim chief executive of TAG Heuer, a watchmaker owned by LVMH.

headline.main: A Secret of Success: 'All You Need Is Love'
